entry.title: Bitcoin Knots 22.0.knots20211108 released
entry.summary: Bitcoin Knots has released version 22.0.knots20211108, which includes new features, bug fixes, performance improvements, and updated translations. Users who prefer to minimize new feature risks can wait for the Long-Term Support 21.2 release, which will be available soon. The release notes and change log can be found on GitHub, where bugs can also be reported using the issue tracker. To receive security and update notifications, users can subscribe to the announcements mailing list on the Bitcoin Knots website. The download link for version 22.0.knots20211108 is also available on the website.
